General.Name: Zhejiang Biyi Electric Appliance Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Zhejiang Biyi Electric Appliance Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of air fryers, air ovens, deep fryers, fry pans, and grills under the Biyi brand name in China. The company also exports its products to the United States, Colombia, the United Kingdom, and other countries and regions. Zhejiang Biyi Electric Appliance Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Yuyao, China.
